div.span: Parents will be notified of weather releated and unscheduled school delays and closings through the Honeywell Instant Alert system. Please make sure that your contact information (telephone, cell phone and email address) is up-to-date with the school offices. Local TV and Spokane Public Radio KPBX FM 91.1 will also broadcast this information as it becomes available.

div.div: If you have questions about the Instant Alert System, please view the Honeywell Parent FAQ sheet.

div.strong: Mary Walker School District ~ 500 N. 4th Street ~ PO Box 159 ~ Springdale, WA 99173 ~ 509-258-4534
